title: Wales Rally GB 2019: Ott Tänak, from 'not good enough' to World Rally Championship lead - and possibly the title
text:
Apart from standing near the Christmas-tree lights that start a drag race, where your insides shake like jelly when dragsters erupt off the start line, no motorsport is as visceral an experience as spectating in a forest during a round of the World Rally Championship (WRC).

Flinging mud and stones at the scenery as if Jackson Pollock had been given a rally car instead of paint brush, the best drivers in the world will this weekend become immersed, and hopefully not embedded, in the flora of mid and north Wales.

Hearing, then seeing and finally feeling the “formula one cars of the forests” is more than sufficient reward for walking deep into the Welsh landscape for a fix of the most varied of...
description: Apart from standing near the Christmas-tree lights that start a drag race, where your insides shake like jelly when dragsters erupt off the start line, no motorsport is as visceral an experience as spectating in a forest during a round of the World Rally Championship (WRC).
